# isIncrementalSearchingEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether incremental searching is enabled.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isIncrementalSearchingEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextFinder] for information about the find bar.

## Related Documentation

- **usesRuler**: A Boolean value that controls whether the text views sharing the receiver’s layout manager use a ruler.

## Using the Find Bar

- **usesFindBar**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to use the find bar for this text view.
